co.cask.cdap.api.data.batch
Interface Scannables.RecordMaker<KEY,VALUE,RECORD>

Type Parameters:
KEY - the key type
VALUE - the value type
RECORD - the type representing a record
All Known Implementing Classes:
KeyValueTable.KeyValueRecordMaker
Enclosing class:
Scannables
public static interface Scannables.RecordMaker<KEY,VALUE,RECORD>

Provides a way to convert a key and a value - as provided by a split reader - in to a single record object.

Method Summary
 RECORD makeRecord(KEY key, VALUE value)
          Convert a single key/value pair into a record.
